Shops.Quote: Hey! How can I help you?
Mystic Falls of Companions: 'Those who bond with their neighbors and share their joy and sorrow are blessed by Yoba.'
Mystic Falls of Love: 'Being able to capture the heart of someone is both a blessing and a curse. But in the presence of these waterfalls, love prefers to be a blessing.'
Mystic Falls of Sacrifice: 'Among the heaviest of burdens are those carried by those who fight for the greater good.'
Welcome! What would you like, dear?

When: d Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri

Shops.Quote: Seeds from our travels. Come take your pick.
Welcome! You can sell almost anything here too!
